item.title: Trump invokes 18th century law to speed deportations, judge stalls it hours later

item.title: Rep. Jasmine Crockett suggests fellow Democrats to reconsider if Chuck Schumer can lead party
item.description: Rep. Jasmine Crockett on Sunday suggested that fellow Democrats seek someone other than Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer to lead the party.

item.title: Trump administration ramps up rhetoric targeting the courts amid mounting legal setbacks
item.description: The new populist president railed against the judiciary as they blocked his aggressive moves to restructure his country's government and economy.

item.title: Education Department staff cuts could limit options for families of kids with disabilities
item.description: For parents of kids with disabilities, advocating for their child can be complicated, time-consuming - and expensive.
